id.description: The unique identifier for the member

email_address.description: The email address of the member

unique_email_id.description: The unique email identifier for the member

contact_id.description: The unique identifier for the contact associated with the member

full_name.description: The full name of the member

web_id.description: The unique identifier for the member on the web

email_type.description: The type of email address (e.g., html, text)

status.description: The subscription status of the member

unsubscribe_reason.description: Reason provided by the member for unsubscribing

consents_to_one_to_one_messaging.description: Indicates if the member has consented to receive one-to-one messaging

merge_fields.description: Merge fields data for the member

interests.description: Interests or preferences of the member

stats.description: Statistics related to the member's email activities

avg_open_rate.description: Average open rate of the member

avg_click_rate.description: Average click rate of the member

total_revenue.description: Total revenue generated by the member

number_of_orders.description: Total number of orders placed by the member

currency_code.description: The currency code used for transactions

ip_signup.description: The IP address where the member signed up

timestamp_signup.description: The timestamp when the member signed up

ip_opt.description: The IP address where the member opted in

timestamp_opt.description: The timestamp when the member opted in

member_rating.description: The rating score assigned to the member

last_changed.description: The date and time when the member was last changed

language.description: The preferred language of the member

vip.description: Indicates if the member is a VIP

email_client.description: The email client used by the member

location.description: Geographical location information of the member

latitude.description: The latitude of the member's location

longitude.description: The longitude of the member's location

dstoff.description: Daylight saving time offset in seconds

country_code.description: The two-letter country code of the member's location

timezone.description: The timezone of the member's location

region.description: The region or area of the member's location

marketing_permissions.description: Marketing permissions granted by the member

marketing_permission_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketing permission

text.description: The text of the marketing permission

enabled.description: Indicates if marketing permissions are enabled

last_note.description: The last note added for the member

note_id.description: The unique identifier for the note

created_at.description: The timestamp when the note was created

created_by.description: The user who created the note

source.description: The source from which the member was added

tags_count.description: The count of tags associated with the member

id.description: The unique identifier for the tag

list_id.description: The unique identifier for the list to which the member belongs
